channel.title: Futurescape v2 317 [Allstar based]
channel.description:
[ul]Welcome!
Many may remember us from back in the day (2008), well; we're back, and have been for quite some time. We have added lots of new content compared to our old v1 source. We are very unique for an allstar based server as we have incorporated features that are unseen on others.
[u][b]Forums:[/b][/u] [url=http://fsforums.zapto.org]Click here[/url] [u][b]Highscores:[/b][/u] [url=http://fshighscores.zapto.org]Click here[/url] [u][b]Webclient:[/b][/u] [url=http://fswebclient.zapto.org]Click here[/url] [u][b]Client Download:[/b][/u] [url=http://uppit.com/4pq00isfporb/Futurescape_Client.zip]Click here[/url] [u][b]Player Logs:[/b][/u] [url=http://fsplayerlogs.zapto.org]Click here[/url]
Amount of players currently online at the time of viewing this thread:
[img]http://futurescape.zapto.org/players.php[/img]
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]
[list] [li]Continued phenomenal uptime. (mopar's server status page reports 98% uptime from it being added on September 17, 2011) [/li] [li]A custom time-based Raffle system that draws 2 winners at 5:00 AM & 5:00 PM server time every day.[/li] [li]A ticket currency (Castle wars tickets) that are worth 1b to assist players to store money.[/li] [li]Dicing and Blackjack with Trusted Dicers.[/li] [li]All skill levels can go to 175 with the maximum combat level being 223.[/li] [li]Custom designed bosses with special attacks that drop sought out items.[/li] [li]Automatic donation & vote system.[/li] [li]A custom 'Soul Split' type prayer that works on both NPC's and players. (Redemption prayer)[/li] [li]A custom set effect, known as the Rockshell set that has the chance to hit between 200 and 255 on NPC's.[/li] [li]An alch value checker command that shows an item's alch value price. (::alchvalue itemID)[/li] [li]Active and friendly community. (over 22,000 accounts made and counting)[/li] [li]The Quest tab has been redesigned as a place to access various things at ease. (PK Point rewards, boss teleports, miscellaneous things)[/li] [li]A custom 'Rejuvenation' spell that when casted on another player who is not in the wild, will restore them to their maximum hitpoints.[/li] [li]A very custom economy that is unlike any other.[/li] [li]Bank pins to secure your bank from unauthorized logins. (accessed via clicking 'Use' on any bank)[/li] [li]Miscellaneous character information available to look at any time via the command ::viewinfo. (can view total boss kills, individual amount of boss kills, total play time, total amount of rare drops, etc)[/li] [li]View other player's miscellaneous character information by clicking 'View Info' on any player who is in range of you.[/li] [li]Custom player titles that you can get by completing various ingame tasks. These are seen when a player right clicks your character and for selection as a yell tag via ::checktitles. (full list is available on our forums under the Guide board)[/li] [li]A note system accessed via the music tab to help players keep track of things.[/li] [li]A second world, known as F2P & P2P. <-- to be completed soon![/li][/list] [/li][/ul]
Not all features are listed, you'll have to log in and see for yourself. ;)
[u][b]Media:[/b][/u]
[u][b]Custom designed bosses[/b]:[/u]
Dagannoth prime
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3aBOv.png[/img]
Dagannoth rex
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KYdOj.png[/img]
Slash bash
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4l3Ug.png[/img]
Jungle demon
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QX3xN.png[/img]
[u][b]Custom Raffle system & status:[/b][/u]
[img]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/2908/e7a728b37dae4c75a5e13b1.png[/img]
[u][b]Note system:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9NTRn.png[/img]
[u][b]Alch value checker:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k7ySu.png[/img]
[u][b]'Soul Split' in action:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/23ti2x2.png[/img]
[u][b]One of the various player titles:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2posiep.png[/img]
[u][b]Our maximum player count since launch of v2:[/b][/u]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/smc1fl.png[/img]
[b]Experience the fun of the golden old days. :)[/b]

item.title: Futurescape v2 317 [Allstar based]
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Cruel Truth:

I played this for a solid good two weeks but just got bored with it eventually. Thanks for the fun memories of allstar!

:D.

Player logs have been added, allowing players to view and search achievements players have gotten (raising skills to the max level and rare boss drops, can use more tracks however).

Edit: We’ve updated the client to have an auto update feature.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Bump, world 2 is making a come back and possibly with the help of an additional IRL developer. We have also rolled out a 2nd dedicated hosting comp for the webserver to balance the load between the webserver and gameserver.

item.title: Futurescape v2 317 [Allstar based]
item.dc:creator: @Xphat_nubX Xphat nubX
item.description:
@Xphat_nubX wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:5, topic:478372”]seems a good allstar only i think that server restart timer and players online will frustrate people.
You could better put it in the quest tab[/quote]

There’s already enough things in the quest tab, e.g. PKP rewards, boss teleports, vote shop, items on death, raffle… the timer/players online have been there for 3 years and I’ve never seen anyone complain about it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Xphat_nubX wrote:

Proud member / ex-staff member of this little piece of art since 2009 If you want an experience unlike any other RSPS, or just aren’t into the whole “new” PI/claws/chaotic/turmoil scene, give FS a shot. Hell, give it a shot anyway

(Yes, that’s me in a couple of those screenshots :D)

Read full topic

item.title: Futurescape v2 317 [Allstar based]
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[ul]Welcome!

Many may remember us from back in the day (2008), well; we’re back, and have been for quite some time. We have added lots of new content compared to our old v1 source. We are very unique for an allstar based server as we have incorporated features that are unseen on others.

Forums: Click here
Highscores: Click here
Webclient: Click here
Client Download: Click here
Player Logs: Click here

Amount of players currently online at the time of viewing this thread:

Features:

[list]
[li]Continued phenomenal uptime. (mopar’s server status page reports 98% uptime from it being added on September 17, 2011) [/li]
[li]A custom time-based Raffle system that draws 2 winners at 5:00 AM & 5:00 PM server time every day.[/li]
[li]A ticket currency (Castle wars tickets) that are worth 1b to assist players to store money.[/li]
[li]Dicing and Blackjack with Trusted Dicers.[/li]
[li]All skill levels can go to 175 with the maximum combat level being 223.[/li]
[li]Custom designed bosses with special attacks that drop sought out items.[/li]
[li]Automatic donation & vote system.[/li]
[li]A custom ‘Soul Split’ type prayer that works on both NPC’s and players. (Redemption prayer)[/li]
[li]A custom set effect, known as the Rockshell set that has the chance to hit between 200 and 255 on NPC’s.[/li]
[li]An alch value checker command that shows an item’s alch value price. (::alchvalue itemID)[/li]
[li]Active and friendly community. (over 22,000 accounts made and counting)[/li]
[li]The Quest tab has been redesigned as a place to access various things at ease. (PK Point rewards, boss teleports, miscellaneous things)[/li]
[li]A custom ‘Rejuvenation’ spell that when casted on another player who is not in the wild, will restore them to their maximum hitpoints.[/li]
[li]A very custom economy that is unlike any other.[/li]
[li]Bank pins to secure your bank from unauthorized logins. (accessed via clicking ‘Use’ on any bank)[/li]
[li]Miscellaneous character information available to look at any time via the command ::viewinfo. (can view total boss kills, individual amount of boss kills, total play time, total amount of rare drops, etc)[/li]
[li]View other player’s miscellaneous character information by clicking ‘View Info’ on any player who is in range of you.[/li]
[li]Custom player titles that you can get by completing various ingame tasks. These are seen when a player right clicks your character and for selection as a yell tag via ::checktitles. (full list is available on our forums under the Guide board)[/li]
[li]A note system accessed via the music tab to help players keep track of things.[/li]
[li]A second world, known as F2P & P2P. <-- to be completed soon![/li][/list]
[/li][/ul]

Not all features are listed, you’ll have to log in and see for yourself.

Dagannoth prime

Dagannoth rex

Experience the fun of the golden old days.

Read full topic
